description.message: Zmniejsz rozmiar czcionki na dowolnej stronie internetowej jednym kliknięciem.

titelintroduce.message: Introducing the new Font Size Decrease!

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

desremrate.message: If you like Font Size Decrease™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

descontextmenu.message: Enable the right click menu to Font Size Decrease the current web page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

permissionactivetab.message: This will only Font Size Decrease the currently open tab page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This is to add the "Font Size Decrease" menu item in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This is to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

pagetitle.message: Decrease font size on this page

desdoubleclick.message: When you double-click the extension icon, it will reset the font size on the current web page
